CustomField.description: This field is manually populated. It is required. This field is a unique identifier for the group and is used, in conjunction with a route's app, to uniquely identify a requested app.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Enter the group portion of the requested app.
E.g. If the requested app is 'loan.change-product', then the group portion is 'loan'.
CustomField.label: App
